amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part C of House Report 117-325 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 4, 8, 12, 13, 21, 25, 26, 30, 32, and 36.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 4, 8, 12, 13, 21, 25, 26, 30, 32, and 36, printed in Part C of House Report 117-325.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 313 - 107 (Roll no. 188).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A002) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 313 - 107 (Roll no. 188).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendments (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 313 - 107 (Roll no. 188).
